data.name: Crossroads Inn Anniversary Edition - Season Pass 2
data.detailed_description:
JOIN THE COMMUNITY


About the Game

Season Pass 2 began on 22nd October 2020, when Crossroads Inn was upgraded to Crossroads Inn Anniversary Edition.

It is available for free for the pass owners from the first season.

This means, if you bought the Season Pass before 22nd October 2020 or bought the legacy Artisan Edition, you will receive an automatic drop of Season Pass 2 content once it becomes available.

The new digital set of goodies will give you instant access to special premium content as soon as it’s published! Expand your tavern with new characters, features, recipes, and fun activities!

The planned premium content includes and is expected to drop as follows:

  • The Circus DLC - August 5th, 2021
  • Booze & Liquor DLC - October 1st, 2021
  • Decoration Packs DLC - May 5th, 2022
  • Double Wedding DLC - expected drop in Q4 2022


The Amazing American Circus came to the kingdom! Greet the new passing-by characters, Jugglers and Clowns, and let even more entertainment into your Inn! Your clientele will get to enjoy their tricks without even going to the show! The Strongman is coming along to watch the backs of the troupe and make rabble think twice before causing a stir.

The Circus DLC:

  • inspired by The Amazing American Circus game
  • 3 new characters:
    - Juggler, Clown (bards functionality)
    - Strongman (regular worker bouncer; can only have 1 in the pool of workers)
  • new items: performance stage



Now we’re talking! Distill the best moonshine available... in your Inn! The moonshiners will focus all their efforts on making the most potent ‘shine to help keep your customers happy and spending.

Booze & Liquor DLC:

  • inspired by Moonshine Inc. game
  • new character: a moonshiner (cook functionality limited to distilling liquors)
  • new item: Pot Still With Worm



Well, would you look at that? An additional pack of 3 sets of new furniture, wallpapers, floor textures, and other decorative elements is designed to thoroughly represent all three kingdoms of Delcrys: Yorevale, Sambria, and Untermarch. So, show the world whose side you’re on in the most fashionable way possible!

Decoration Packs DLC:

  • 3 additional packs of floor textures, decorative elements, wallpapers, etc.



Organizing a wedding reception is a very complicated project, but just imagine how complicated it can get when you need to organize two weddings at once! Things get nasty when Mavia and countess Eliisa want to change their marital status, and you need to fulfill their expectations of what the reception will look like. Become the medieval fantasy wedding planner and flip the Ladies' reception making it a legendary event known all across Delcrys and beyond.

Double Wedding DLC:

  • New scenario

data.short_description: The second season began on 22nd October 2020, when Crossroads Inn was upgraded to Crossroads Inn Anniversary Edition.Expect new content drop: The Circus DLC, Booze & Liquor DLC, Decoration Packs DLC, Double Wedding DLC.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, German, French, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Dual-Core - Intel i3 2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 2400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-Core - Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce 9400M or equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: El Capitan 10.11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-Core - Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Dual-Core - Intel i3 2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 5850
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: i5 2400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / Radeon R7 240

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Crossroads Inn Anniversary Edition - Season Pass 2

subs.option_text: Crossroads Inn Anniversary Edition - Season Pass 2 - 169₴

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
